job description:
Description

Data Scientist opening in Florida. Conduct extensive programming and analytics to determine pricing for P&C and Health Insurance companies; manipulate/aggregate big data and construct datasets to facilitate insurance analytics; create machine learning algorithms; design and implement metrics to monitor models.

Requirements

Ideal candidate has advanced degree and 3+ years of statistical modeling and/or data mining experience; knowledge of statistical theory and machine learning techniques, including generalized linear models, decision trees, artificial intelligence and clustering techniques; strong R and SQL; Predictive Analytic certification a plus; insurance experience a plus (not required); actuarial exams not required. Salary $open. (PR10437)
